Trinity/Nightlight::

Trinity couldn't answer, her sobbs and tears didn't let her speak. 
Nightlight follow them and when she heard thas Aerotaur said that she 
replied  "I think that that won't be good idea Aerotaur, that could 
be pretty shoked for her..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>       He holds her tight to his chest and picks her up.  He carries 
her into the ship.  "Do you want to see him?  To say good bye?"
